mapper.insert: insert into course(course_name, p_id, c_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{courseName}, #{professionId}, #{classId}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.update:
update course
p_id = #{professionId},
c_id = #{classId},
user_id = #{userId},
content = #{content},
course_name = #{courseName},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id as id, course_name courseName, c.p_id professionId, c_id classId, user_id userId, content, p.name professionName,c2.name className ,ui.name userName from course c left join profession p on p.id = c.p_id left join class c2 on c.c_id = c2.id left join user_info ui on c.user_id = ui.id
